snippet: A study released on Thursday found that only a handful of vehicles deserved the highest rating for ease of child safety seat installation.
abstract: Insurance Institute for Highway Safety study finds that only handful of vehicles qualify for highest rating for ease of child safety seat installation; only 3 of 102 vehicles earn rating.
lead_paragraph: A study released on Thursday found that only a handful of vehicles deserved the highest rating for ease of child safety seat installation.

headline.main: Few Vehicles Equipped for Easy Car Seat Installation
headline.print_headline: Few Vehicles Equipped for Easy Car Seat Installation
